short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chat application with real-time translation between English and Japanese and vice versa

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NihonGo is basically a chat app which can make real translation like when the user sends the message in English and it will display the English text with translated Japanese and vice versa. And User can create the separate a room and connect with others. like that user can join rooms. Our application aim is to break the language barrier between English and Japanese. Future We will make it as multilingual translation App.
